var eventFilters = {
    stop: function (e) {
        e.stopPropagation()
        return e
    },
    prevent: function (e) {
        e.preventDefault()
        return e
    }
}
var keys = {
    esc: 27,
    tab: 9,
    enter: 13,
    space: 32,
    del: 46,
    up: 38,
    left: 37,
    right: 39,
    down: 40
}
for (var name in keys) {
    (function (filter, key) {
        eventFilters[filter] = function (e) {
            if (e.which !== key) {
                e.$return = true
            }
            return e
        }
    })(name, keys[name])
}
 
 
export { eventFilters }
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Wed Jan 04 2017 13:06:44 GMT+0800 (CST)
